# dataClean
```{r}
fulldata[fulldata < 0 ] <- NA
fulldata <- fulldata %>%
  group_by(countrycode) %>%
  mutate(dem_electoral_lag = lag(dem_electoral),
         dem_liberal_lag = lag(dem_liberal),
         rgdppna_lag = lag(rgdppna),
         gdpp_lag = lag(gdpp),
         gdppg_lag = lag(gdppg),
         infla_deflator_lag = lag(infla_deflator),
         consumerPrices_lag = lag(consumerPrices),
         inflation_lag = lag(inflation),
         gini_tax_lag = lag(gini_tax),
         gini_mkt_lag = lag(gini_mkt),
         ) %>%
  ungroup()

fulldata <- fulldata %>%
  select(ccode,countrycode,countryname,year,leader,gender,yrborn,yrdied,age,startdate,enddate,leader_position,leader_ideology,leader_ideology_num_redux,leader_party_eng,leader_party_abbr,entry,exit,exitcode,parliamentary,yrsoffc,finittrm,execrlc,execnat,termlimit,dem_electoral,dem_electoral_lag,dem_liberal,dem_liberal_lag,leg_ideol,leg_leader,leg_perfermance,leg_legal,mob_mass,mob_demo,mob_auto,pol_society,pol_political,lib_civil,cap_territory,cap_fiscal,type,regimeType,rgdpna,pop_pwt,rgdppna,rgdppna_lag,gdppg,gdppg_lag,gdpp,gdpp_lag,pop,popl,infla_deflator,infla_deflator_lag,consumerPrices,consumerPrices_lag,inflation,inflation_lag,gini_tax,gini_mkt,gini_tax_lag,gini_mkt_lag,oil,regionpol,region) %>%
  filter(.,!(ccode %in% c("711","31","80","835")))


fulldata <- fulldata %>%
  mutate(
    start_year = year(fulldata$startdate),
    end_year = year(fulldata$enddate),
    year_off = end_year - start_year,
    score_dummy = case_when(
   dem_electoral %in% c(0:0.5) ~ 0,
   dem_electoral %in% c(0.51:1) ~ 1,
  )) 

dem_country <- fulldata %>%
  select(.,ccode,countrycode,countryname,year,leader,dem_electoral,start_year,end_year) %>%
  group_by(ccode) %>%
  summarise(
    score_countrym = mean(dem_electoral,na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  ungroup

dem_lead <- fulldata %>%
  select(.,ccode,countrycode,countryname,year,leader,dem_electoral,start_year,end_year) %>%
  group_by(leader) %>%
  summarise(
    score_leaderm = mean(dem_electoral,na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  ungroup

dem_di <- fulldata %>%
  select(.,ccode,countrycode,countryname,year,leader,dem_electoral,start_year,end_year) %>% 
  group_by(countryname) %>% 
  arrange(year) %>% 
  mutate(diff_socre = ifelse(year == start_year, (lag(dem_electoral) - lead(dem_electoral)),NA_real_)) %>% 
  mutate(score_before = ifelse(year == start_year,(((lag(dem_electoral,default = 0) + lag(dem_electoral,2,default = 0) + lag(dem_electoral,3,default = 0) + lag(dem_electoral,4,default = 0)))/4),NA_real_)) %>%
  mutate(score_after = ifelse(year == start_year,(((lead(dem_electoral,default = 0) + lead(dem_electoral,2,default = 0) + lead(dem_electoral,3,default = 0) +lead(dem_electoral,4,default = 0)))/4),NA_real_)) %>%
  ungroup()

df_reduced <- dem_di %>%
  select(leader,start_year,diff_socre, score_before,score_after) %>%
  drop_na()
dem_di <- dem_di %>% 
  select(-c(diff_socre,score_before,score_after))

dem_di <- dem_di %>% 
  left_join(.,df_reduced,by = c(
    "leader" = "leader",
    "start_year" = "start_year"
  )) 

fulldata <- fulldata %>%
  left_join(.,dem_country) %>%
  left_join(.,dem_lead) %>%
  left_join(.,dem_di)

fulldata$diff_lead_counrty <- fulldata$score_leaderm - fulldata$score_countrym
fulldata$diff_before_country <- fulldata$score_before - fulldata$score_countrym
fulldata$diff_after_country <- fulldata$score_after - fulldata$score_countrym
fulldata$diff_lead <- fulldata$score_after - fulldata$score_before
fulldata$diff_vol <- (fulldata$score_before - fulldata$score_countrym) - (fulldata$score_after - fulldata$score_countrym)
#write.csv(fulldata_year,file = "../data/fulldata.csv",row.names = FALSE)

fulldata_year <- fulldata %>%
  group_by(countrycode,leader) %>%
  summarize(year_offs = year_off) %>%
  filter(.,year_offs >= 3) %>%
  distinct()
fulldata_year <- fulldata_year %>%
  left_join(.,fulldata,by =c("countrycode","leader"))
  
#write.csv(fulldata_yearm,file = "../data/fulldata(clean).csv",row.names = FALSE)

```
